resources.string: Notifications for entering or leaving geofences created by Never Late
In order for Never Late to properly work access to your location and to calendar events is needed. Please grant the required permissions
Geofences were successfully updated, notifications will be sent if you will not make it to your event
failed to load the geofences, will try again on the next scheduled update
In order to make it in time for your event you need to start driving now to
Time to leave to scheduled event -
Oops looks like you left the drivable distance to your event. Maybe if you drive fast you can still make it :)
Oops looks like you left the drivable distance to your event. You still have time before the event ends.
Its time to get driving if you want to make your event. Tap here to launch maps.
Internet connection is required. Check your settings and try again
Never late is tracking your location while you drive. This is being done to make sure you will make your events on time. To cancel the tracking just click cancel.
